On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Bob

 5th ave & Union, Brooklyn

⏲ 11:06 p.m. on Wednesday, November 06

What are you doing today?

I’m here after work. This is my friends’ place. It’s the biggest sports bar in Brooklyn. I came to get something to eat and talk to a couple people, see if they were interested in helping out and donating some time for the kids. It’s the Secret Sandy Clause project. If you know someone that needs a toy, you put down a toy that they want and they will get it.

What's your favorite part of the day?

I guess when I wake up and have nothing to do. I can just kick back and grab a newspaper, grab a book and just relax. They are very far and few between.

What are you doing tomorrow?

Tomorrow is an ordeal. I’m off tomorrow. I’ll go see my granddaughter and daughter tomorrow. It’s a great day.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
